claim: See Fig 1 for a screenshot of RLetters’ search interface.
title: Fig 1. The basic search interface for RLetters.
caption: In this screenshot of RLetters’ test database, containing the entirety of PLoS Neglected Tropical Diseases, we see an example page of search results, showing links to filter the data and retrieve more information about each article.

claim: The marker lists were generated, and RLetters also created word clouds for each set of marker words, included as Fig 2A and 2B.
title: Fig 2. Marker words for PLoS Biology vs. PLoS Computational Biology.
caption: The fifty words (scaled according to strength of inference) that let us infer that a randomly selected manuscript likely belongs in PLoS Biology rather than in PLoS Computational Biology (A) and vice versa (B). Word clouds generated by RLetters.
